mapper.select: select * from newzipcode where sido like '%'||#{sido}||'%' and nvl(sigungu,'0') like '%'||#{sigungu}||'%' and roadname like '%'||#{roadname}||'%'
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name}, pwd=#{pwd}, gender=#{gender}, email1=#{email1},email2=#{email2},tel1=#{tel1},tel2=#{tel2},tel3=#{tel3},zipcode=#{zipcode}, addr1=#{addr1}, addr2=#{addr2}, logtime=sysdate where id=?
mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and pwd=#{pwd}
